short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter search results for your favorite websites on Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you prioritise Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo search results from your favourite websites. Here's how to use it:

- Add websites you want to prioritise in the input field above and click "Add Website" or press Enter.
- You can add multiple websites. Each website can be a domain name (e.g., "example.com") or a specific page (e.g., "example.com/page").
- To remove a website, click the "Remove" button next to it in the list above.
- When you perform a Google, Bing or DuckDuckGo search, the extension will automatically open to show prioritised results from your saved websites.

Note: The extension only works on Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo search result pages. It does not affect your search results on other websites.
